DOC.brief_summary: Patients suffering from Fibromyalgia will be examined for the presence of memory and/or cognitive impairment using specific psychological tests. Their results will be compared to those with active RA associated with pain and with a normal control group.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive and Memory Function in Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Patients suffering from fibromyalgia patients suffering from active RA Patients with depressive disorders Patients treated with SSRI
